DocAttribute.Name: NumberOfRisers
NumberOfTreads
RiserHeight
TreadLength
PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic type for a stair flight that is specified in an enumeration. There may be a property set given specificly for the predefined types. > NOTE  The _PredefinedType_ shall only be used, if no _IfcStairFlightType_ is assigned, providing its own _IfcStairFlightType.PredefinedType_.
{ .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE The attribute has been added at the end of the entity definition.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcStairFlightType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcStairFlightTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcStairFlightTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no stair flight type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcStairFlightType_.
